title: varugavarugavE
sahitya:
varuga varugavE tirumalai uraindiDum karumukhilE aruL pozhiga pozhigavE



anupallavi



maraiyuDaiyOn Eru viDaiyuDaiyOn Aru mukhamuDaiyOn paNiyum tiruvuDaiyOi ingu



caraNam



mOhana muruval mukham kaNDu piravi shOkam tavirkkum vizhi aruLai uNDu un
 tAL malar tazhuviDadAgham koNDu nALum tavittiDum enakkun darishanam tandiDa
